name: Dr statsvenu.GitHub.io
body:
I am DR. Venugopala Rao Manneni has around 14 years of experience in the field of Data Analysis and Research. I holds MSC, MPhil and PhD in statistics from Osmania University.

My substantive expertise is in understanding of mathematical & statistical theories, experimenting with new technologies and innovative use of theories in the field of analytics and Data Science.

I have been successfully training and managing a sincere and dedicated team of analysts at Juxt Smart Mandate using various Statistical and Machine Learning Algorithms  using variety of open source tools as well as customized software. And also expertise in trade off techniques as well as data processing.
 
I worked for the  clients across verticals such as  - Manufacturing, Service, Media, Telecom, Retail, Pharma and Education. 

I worked with reputed organization like TNS India (Kantar, WPP) and NFO MBL and served clients across UK, France and Asia Pacific region.

I have completed my  MPhil. and Phd. in Statistics from Osmania University, Hyderabad. The focus of My PhD was on “Hybrid data mining techniques”, titled “Neural network applications in classification problems” and his MPhil thesis focused on “Multivariate analysis applications in business and research”, titled “Evolution of business organization using multivariate techniques”.  I am  topped the university for the MSc. Statistics Program in 2003; I was adjudged the best Quantum programmer in the year 2004 in TNS India.

I have  over 10 publications in prestigious national/international journals on Hybrid analytical approaches in data mining and forecasting.

I love to watch & Play Cricket and  badminton along  reading about statistics.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
